scripts.dev: npm run task-kill && npm run clean && npm run update-version && npm run build-python && npm run dev-ui
scripts.dev-cuda: npm run task-kill && npm run clean && npm run update-version && npm run build-python-cuda && npm run dev-ui
scripts.dev-ui: npm run task-kill && npm-run-all --parallel vite tauri-dev
scripts.build: npm run task-kill && npm run clean && npm run update-version && npm run build-python && npm run vite-build && npm run tauri build
scripts.build-cuda: npm run task-kill && npm run clean && npm run update-version && npm run build-python-cuda && npm run vite-build && npm run tauri build
scripts.release: npm run update-version && npm run build && python utils\zip.py --zip_name VRCT.zip
scripts.release-cuda: npm run update-version && npm run build-cuda && python utils\zip.py --zip_name VRCT_cuda.zip
scripts.release-all: npm run update-version && npm run release && npm run release-cuda
